Package com.company

Class BinaryHeap<E extends Comparable<E>>

java.lang.Object
com.company.BinaryTree<E>
com.company.BinaryHeap<E>
Type Parameters:
E - Type of items contained.
public class BinaryHeap<E extends Comparable<E>> extends BinaryTree<E>
Binary heap data structure. Keeps the minimum value at root. And as nodes are deeper the values are bigger.
